ui-tailwind.$description: Tokens that are transformed to be applied to distinct Tailwind corePlugins.

color.$description: Tokens that are allowed to be used with any corePlugin.

DEFAULT.$description: Color for default state of interactive elements.

hover.$description: Color for hover state of interactive elements.

active.$description: Color for active state of interactive elements.

subtle-hover.$description: Color for hover state of bigger areas or subtle buttons.

subtle-active.$description: Color for active state of bigger areas or subtle buttons.

secondary.$description: Color for interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

secondary-hover.$description: Color for hover state of interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

secondary-active.$description: Color for active state of interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

secondary-subtle.$description: Color for interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

secondary-subtle-hover.$description: Color for hover state of interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

secondary-subtle-active.$description: Color for active state of interactive elements that should appear less prominent.

on-dark.$description: Color for text or borders that has sufficient contrast on dark surface.

default.$description: Default color for text that should be readable.

muted.$description: Color for text that should stand out a little less. Has sufficient contrast on white.

marked.$description: Color for highlighting portions of text. To be used together with bg-text-marked

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

interactive.$description: Color for interactive text to communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to noticeably communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

icon.$description: Icon color to noticeably communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

interactive.$description: Color for interactive text to noticeably communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate importance, danger, and immediate action within system feedback components.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate importance, danger, and immediate action within system feedback components.

interactive.$description: Color for interactive text to communicate importance, danger, and immediate action within system feedback components.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate successful state change within system feedback components.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate successful state change within system feedback components.

interactive.$description: Color for interactive text to communicate successful state change within system feedback components.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate information for debugging purposes within system feedback components.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate information for debugging purposes within system feedback components.

interactive.$description: Color for interactive text to communicate information for debugging purposes within system feedback components.

selected.$description: Color used to visualize selected elements (ex: selection-text).

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate that something is in progress.

fill.$description: Fill color to communicate that something is in progress. Use for charts.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate that something is in progress.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate something has moved or changed.

fill.$description: Fill color to communicate something has moved or changed. Use for charts.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate something has moved or changed.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate that an action or validation has failed on an item.

fill.$description: Fill color to communicate that an action or validation has failed on an item. Use for charts.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate that an action or validation has failed on an item.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate that an action has completed, or something has been added.

fill.$description: Fill color to communicate that an action has completed, or something has been added. Use for charts.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate that an action has completed, or something has been added.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate neutral or unknown status.

fill.$description: Fill color to communicate neutral or unknown status. Use for charts.

icon.$description: Icon color to communicate neutral or unknown status.

backgroundColor.$description: Tokens that are meant to be used with the backgroundColor corePlugin.

muted.$description: Background color for interactive elements that reveal their base state on:hover of a parent element, eg. in a table row. Note that this is not to be conflated with the disabled state, which is communicated via opacity.

info.$description: Background color to communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

warning.$description: Background color to noticeably communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

severe.$description: Background color to communicate importance, danger, and immediate action within system feedback components.

success.$description: Background color to communicate successful state change within system feedback components.

debug.$description: Background color to communicate information for debugging purposes within system feedback components.

selected.$description: Background Color used to visualize selected elements (ex: selection-bg).

progress.$description: Background color to communicate that something is in progress (ex: status-progress-text).

changed.$description: Background color to communicate something has moved or changed.

failed.$description: Background color to communicate that an action or validation has failed on an item.

complete.$description: Background color to communicate that an action has completed, or something has been added.

DEFAULT.$description: Text color to communicate neutral or unknown status.

surface.$description: Colors to apply to the main interface areas of the application

light.$description: Lightest background color that is discernible on normal monitors.

medium.$description: Medium background color for boxes etc.

deleted-muted.$description: Background color for deleted (del) areas of text.

inserted-muted.$description: Background color for highlighting portions of text, that is discernible from 'bg-text-marked'

marked.$description: Background color for highlighting portions of text.

info.$description: Border color to communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

warning.$description: Border color to noticeably communicate uncritical information within system feedback components.

severe.$description: Border color to communicate importance, danger, and immediate action within system feedback components.

success.$description: Border color to communicate successful state change within system feedback components.

debug.$description: Border color to communicate information for debugging purposes within system feedback components.

neutral.$description: Default color used for borders within the application.

failed.$description: Border color to communicate that an action or validation has failed on an item.
